verbs.description: revoice (third-person singular simple present revoices, present participle revoicing, simple past and past participle revoiced)

examples: Then, students could revoice the satirical boardroom discussion using their identified issue.

entries.meaning: (Internet, transitive) To restore the voice flag to a user on IRC, allowing them to send messages to the channel again.
(transitive) To replace the voice of an actor with that of another speaking a translation; to dub.
